title: IModelViewManager.CreateFeatureMgrWindowFromHandlex64
description: On 64-bit machines, creates a new view in the FeatureManager design tree using the specified .NET tab control.
signature:

   System.String
BitMapFile
,
   System.Int64
WindowHandle
,
   System.String
ToolTip
,
   System.Int32
WhichPane
)

parameters.name: BitMapFile
parameters.description: Fully qualified path to the bitmap file that you want to use for the control

parameters.name: WhichPane
parameters.description: Pane to use as defined in swFeatMgrPane_e

remarks: This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
